products.title: Splash Smokey Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash smokey purple 89mm vertical blind in purple. Made to measure from 9.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their splash smokey purple vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant dark purple fabric with a beautiful dark purplehue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window.At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first. This bespoke vertical blind comes with a 5 year guarantee, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb1285 fabric colour: smokey purple material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with clear tilt wand or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash sloe purple 89mm vertical blind in purple. Made to measure from 9.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash sloe purple is a chic soft purple vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this purple vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Their quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by their blind experts, quality is paramount. At swift direct blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under their belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts, it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout sloe purple 89mm vertical blind in purple. Made to measure from 14.14 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This soft bella blackout sloe purple vertical blind brings warm-toned splash of purple to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office!Our best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This gorgeous purple vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Acacia Mulberry
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure acacia mulberry standard vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm &amp; 127mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
